scripts.build:infra: cd infraestructura && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.postbuild:infra: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public\infraestructura -ErrorAction Ignore; robocopy infraestructura\dist public\infraestructura /E"
scripts.deploy:infra: npm run build:infra && npm run postbuild:infra
scripts.build:all: npm run deploy:infra && npm run build
